entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
